chapter: External causes of morbidity and mortality
block: Medical devices associated with adverse incidents in diagnostic and therapeutic use
category: General hospital and personal-use devices associated with adverse incidents
title: General hospital and personal-use devices associated with adverse incidents : therapeutic (nonsurgical) and rehabilitative devices
inclusion: correct drug properly administered in therapeutic or prophylactic dosage as the cause of any adverse effect
misadventures to patients during surgical and medical care
surgical and medical procedures as the cause of abnormal reaction of the patient, or of later complication, without mention of misadventure at the time of the procedure
breakdown or malfunctioning of medical device (during procedure)(after implantation)(ongoing use)
exclusion: accidental overdose of drug or wrong drug given or taken in error
later complications following use of medical devices without mention of breakdown or malfunctioning of medical device
medical devices associated with adverse incidents due to external causes classified elsewhere
misadventure to patients during surgical and medical care, classifiable to Y60-Y69
